title: Anyone looking to buy or trade high grade T206s?
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: Anyone looking to buy or trade high grade T206s?
posts.post_content: Please let me know what you might be looking for...thanks

i still need a mordecai brown portrait. oh yea. you sold it to someone else after we had a deal. i forgot about that.

kevin

You have a short memory dumb ass. We agreed on a figure, and then you bitched about the price after seeing what another card sold for previously... You truly have the brains of a fire ant.... Go waste another person's time elsewhere.....Better yet, why don't you re-visit the poll you had about the PSA 7 Mordecai Brown, and how cheap the card should sell for compared to the one that I offered you....In short, go away and get a life....

[quote name="CMIZ5290" post=1238344]You have a short memory dumb ass. We agreed on a figure, and then you bitched about the price after seeing what another card sold for previously... You truly have the brains of a fire ant.... Go waste another person's time elsewhere.....Better yet, why don't you re-visit the poll you had about the PSA 7 Mordecai Brown, and how cheap the card should sell for compared to the one that I offered you....In short, go away and get a life....[/QUOTE]

your right. we agreed on a price. that solidified the deal. you don't have to worry. i will never do business with you. period. as a side note, your referring to the poll where the majority of the people agreed with me on the price, then you came back and emailed me saying i was right, appologied then still wanted to try and work out a deal at a lower price. right?

to quote you "If you want to revisit this, I will put thought to possibly a better price, and email you tomorrow from my office. Let me know...thanks"

yep. that one.

maybe i should have asked you "what is your point?"

kevin

[quote name="thehoodedcoder" post=1238360]your right. we agreed on a price. that solidified the deal. you don't have to worry. i will never do business with you. period. as a side note, your referring to the poll where the majority of the people agreed with me on the price, then you came back and emailed me saying i was right, appologied then still wanted to try and work out a deal at a lower price. right?

yep. that one.

kevin[/QUOTE]

So, if we agreed upon a price, why did you back up on the deal?? You just stated the card was sold out from under you....Word of advice, you might want to get your s*** straight....

[quote name="thehoodedcoder" post=1238360]your right. we agreed on a price................... .......... appologied then still wanted to try and work out a deal at a lower price. right?


kevin[/QUOTE]


Just curious but if y'all had agreed on a price, why wasn't the seller paid, without the seller having to apologize and work out a deal at a lower price later?

Just wondering, 

Mike

kevin[/QUOTE]

delete, previous post...

Just wondering, 

Mike[/QUOTE]

The other card was a PSA 7 Mordecai Brown (Cubs shirt) that he did a poll on Net54 after I gave him a price,( completely different card). He thought my price was high (no agreement had been struck), and he was getting other member's opinions about the value, thus the poll. The card that he backed up on was an SGC 82 Mordecai Brown (port.)

[quote name="CMIZ5290" post=1238369]Mike- as I said before, he re-nigged after seeing a previous sale on the card....[/QUOTE]


Thanks, I understand now.  

Mike

Is there really a need to air gripes over a previous failed deal on someone's current B/S/T thread? If the issue was resolved (even if it was agree to disagree), why don't you move on and let things go?

i didn't go out of any deal. you responded to me saying you already sold the card, after we agreed on the price.

do i need to post a screen shot of the email or do you plan on stopping your lie there?

kevin

[quote name="wolf441" post=1238383]Is there really a need to air gripes over a previous failed deal on someone's current B/S/T thread? If the issue was resolved (even if it was agree to disagree), why don't you move on and let things go?[/QUOTE]

Steve- I agree...Kevin, PM me or email me and take this off the board with any gripes you have....This is my last post....

you agree because you are about to get called on it.

see attached screen shot. the order of things is out of whack as responses where arbitrarily added to the tops and bottoms as the conversation went along.

Hoodedcoder - This is not the way to handle this situation. 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk

I have attempted to move on from this multiple times but he kept on prodding the bull in the cage, specifically the previous couple of Fridays. Its only kharma coming back around.

Probably wouldn't have happened if he hadn't tried to lie about it 2 things in the same thread or crapped all over my threads for no reason. If you are going to make a point, they should be factual, especially if you are attempting to do damage control. Its helpful if your damage control doesn't hurt you.

I never cast the first stone and you can see in my emails I was polite, even after some of the previous angst. I think that the record has been straightened out a little bit now and things have been evened up a little. At least I consider us even. Maybe now things can die off, but we shall see who throws the next stone, won't we?

Kevin

Kevin - You are making yourself look bad. Regardless of what happened this is poor form. 


Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Kevins just ignore each other as I have learned to do. I have a beef also but am not going to air it publicly per Leons request.
